location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Henry Willock, His Majesty's Chargé d’Affaires, Teheran [Tehran]

mods.abstract: Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, transmits five dispatches (not included) addressed to Henry Willock's brother, Major George Willock, which reached Bushire by boat from Muscat on 8 April 1824.
